caption.p: G. pallida has a lower thermal limit than G. rostochiensis. G. pallida has a significantly higher expression of hsp20 genes, kin-20, mnk-1, and ndk-1 during hatch at 20 °C compared with 15 °C ( A), unlike G. rostochiensis ( B). Expression of other heat inducible genes is not significantly increased by hatch temperature in either species. Mean ± SEM, Kruskal–Wallis test and Dunn’s multiple comparison test, n ≥ 3, * P < 0.05, ** P < 0.01, *** P < 0.001.
